title: Interested in online tournaments?!
body:
Heya all, If you are interested, or know someone that is interested in online tournaments send them to this group, we post information on upcoming online tournaments, and can be a good way to find teams that have already been formed, or be able to form one yourself, I update as regularly as possible and try to be as helpful as possible so everyone can have a friendly and useful experience! 

https://www.facebook.com/groups/149813008748980/

*If you wish to have your tournaments/events(online or irl) advertised please contact me*
